unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Two Way Tables: Support of Copyright Disagreement and Nationality
question_text: John believes that nationality plays a role in who supports Bill Phillips or Ted Todd in their disagreement over copyright. What is the probability that a person is Canadian given that they support Bill? Who Do You Support? Canadians Americans Total Ted 89 243 332 Bill 142 103 245 Total 231 346 577
